page.title: 11QUESTIONAIRE - Introduction
page.content: As part of our survey,we decided to study the changing lifestyles of the people in our area.Our intention was to show this to the children via statistics obtained using a questionaire.The area we are dealing with has seen a great change in recent years.In the 1950's this area was famous for its cotton mills and slipper works.The majority of people working within walking distance of their homes.Since the decline in the cotton and related industries some of the large factories have been demolished,but others have remained, being split into smaller units,and used for new enterprises. As we have such excellent motorway links i.e.via the M66, we now see a new trend,that of people moving into the area and commuting to their place of work.
